tasks.run: export env=dev && export SERVER_KEY=test_12345 && cd ../ && deno run -A  --unsafely-ignore-certificate-errors --watch ./space/index.js
tasks.dev: export env=dev && export SERVER_KEY=test_12345 && deno run -A --watch --unstable  --unsafely-ignore-certificate-errors --import-map=./import_map.dev.json ./index.js
